channel.title: Guitar Hero - World Tour
channel.description:
I'm going to a mates place to go play World Tour!
Be back in a few hours.
comment on how awesome it is and i shall confirm the awesomeness when i get back.
[b]edit[/b]. [i]Didnt see the other topic. Lock this one if you want, tis just spam now[/i]

item.title: Guitar Hero - World Tour
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

i made probably around 50 posts at least in that 72 hour peroid. Drank 2 bottles of vodka, got high, broke a toe, experienced the most hilarious rat and had 7 arguments with people in real life.

Even if i had the brain space to remember where i posted and why, its not really something i would bother remembering, unless its a relevant post

Read full topic

item.title: Guitar Hero - World Tour
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Squigglyo, post:5, topic:245104”]i apologize for not memorizing every single post i have ever made.

I will try harder next time, and will remove my left testicle as penance[/quote]
If you cannot remember a simple thing from less than 72 hours ago, that is pretty irresponsible of you. I have the utter most respect for you, and quite like your entertaining posts, Scott, but yeah.

Read full topic

item.title: Guitar Hero - World Tour
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Squigglyo, post:3, topic:245104”]was in a rush, didnt know there was another thread already for it.

But, the game is awesome. played for 5 hours straight, and now have splinters and numb fingers.
Great game. Crappy music for the part of career we played though. still good game[/quote]
So that explains why you posted in my thread on the 17th, and created this on the 19th?

Read full topic

Great game. Crappy music for the part of career we played though. still good game
